definition: most distant in any direction, the furthest or highest degree of something
details:
adjective
- most distant in any direction
= example: most distant in any direction
- of the greatest possible degree or extent or intensity
= example: of the greatest possible degree or extent or intensity
= synonyms: utmost, uttermost
- far beyond a norm in quantity or amount or degree
- beyond a norm in views or actions
= example: beyond a norm in views or actions
noun
- the furthest or highest degree of something
= example: the furthest or highest degree of something
- the point located farthest from the middle of something
= synonyms: extreme point, extremum
